title: Normal Distribution: Giganticville
question_text:
The distribution of heights of $4\text{-year-old boys}$ in the town of Giganticville is approximately normally distributed with a mean of $78.0$ inches and standard deviation of $4.3\text{ inches}$.
Manute, a $4\text{-year-old-boy}$ from Giganticville has a height that is $0.23$ standard deviations below the mean. His $4\text{-year-old-boy}$ neighbor Mugsy is at the $45^\text{th}$ percentile of the height distribution.
What percentile is Manute's height, and how does his height compare to Mugsy's height?

choices.text: Manute's height is at the $41^\text{st}$ percentile of the distribution, and he is shorter than Mugsy.
